Name: Model Kit Simulator VR
About the game: Model Kit Simulator VR is a casual simulation where players can assemble and paint simple model kits in VR: great for people looking for leisure VR experience easy to get into; great for showing off VR to your friends has multiple model kits to choose from now supports user generated contents!
